ValidationRule.description: Prevents all users form choosing "Sold" as the Deal Stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Sold_Loan_Pool__c ), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Sold") , NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = "Integration", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected an invalid Stage
